com.constantcontact.v2

Interface LibraryService


  • public interface LibraryService
    Retrofit interface for Library Information, File, and Folder calls against the Constant Contact API

    • Method Summary

      • getLibraryInfo

        @GET(value="v2/library/info")
retrofit2.Call<com.constantcontact.v2.library.LibraryInfo> getLibraryInfo()
        Get the Account's LibraryInfo
        Returns:
        an Observable that emits LibraryInfo

      • getFolders

        @GET(value="v2/library/folders")
retrofit2.Call<Paged<com.constantcontact.v2.library.Folder>> getFolders(@Query(value="limit")
                                                                                                         int limit,
                                                                                                         @Query(value="sort_by")
                                                                                                         com.constantcontact.v2.library.FolderSortOrder sortOrder)
        Get a Paged collection of Folder
        Parameters:
        limit - Size of page to return (1-1000)
        sortOrder - FolderSortOrder
        Returns:
        an Observable that emits Paged Folders

      • getFolders

        @GET(value="v2/library/folders?next={next}")
retrofit2.Call<Paged<com.constantcontact.v2.library.Folder>> getFolders(@Path(value="next")
                                                                                                                     java.lang.String nextLink)
        Get a Paged collection of Folder
        Parameters:
        nextLink - Value of the link found in the meta of the original call
        Returns:
        an Observable that emits Paged Folders

      • createFolder

        @POST(value="v2/library/folders")
retrofit2.Call<com.constantcontact.v2.library.Folder> createFolder(@Body
                                                                                                     com.constantcontact.v2.library.Folder folder)
        Create a new Folder
        Parameters:
        folder - Folder with only the name and parentId values
        Returns:
        an Observable that emits a Folder

        @PUT(value="v2/library/folders/{folderId}?include_payload=TRUE")
retrofit2.Call<com.constantcontact.v2.library.Folder> updateFolder(@Path(value="folderId")

                                                                                                                                    com.constantcontact.v2.library.Folder folder)

      • getFiles

        @GET(value="v2/library/files")
retrofit2.Call<Paged<com.constantcontact.v2.library.File>> getFiles(@Query(value="limit")
                                                                                                   int limit,
                                                                                                   @Query(value="sort_by")
                                                                                                   com.constantcontact.v2.library.FileSortOrder sortOrder,

                                                                                                   @Query(value="type")
                                                                                                   com.constantcontact.v2.library.FileTypeQuery type)
        Get a Paged collection of File
        Parameters:
        limit - Size of page to return (1-1000)
        sortOrder - FileSortOrder
        source - FileSource
        type - FileTypeQuery
        Returns:
        an Observable that emits Paged Files

      • getFiles

                                                                                                               java.lang.String nextLink)

      • getFilesByFolder

        @GET(value="v2/library/folders/{folderId}/files")
retrofit2.Call<Paged<com.constantcontact.v2.library.File>> getFilesByFolder(@Path(value="folderId")
                                                                                                                              java.lang.String folderId,
                                                                                                                              @Query(value="limit")
                                                                                                                              int limit,
                                                                                                                              @Query(value="sort_by")
                                                                                                                              com.constantcontact.v2.library.FileSortOrder sortOrder,
                                                                                                                              @Query(value="source")
                                                                                                                              com.constantcontact.v2.library.FileSource source,
                                                                                                                              @Query(value="type")
                                                                                                                              com.constantcontact.v2.library.FileTypeQuery type)
        Get a Paged collection of File from a specific Folder.

        To get a list of files in the trash folder, pass "trash" as the folderId.

        Parameters:
        folderId - The Folder ID
        limit - Size of page to return (1-1000)
        sortOrder - FileSortOrder
        source - FileSource
        type - FileTypeQuery
        Returns:
        an Observable that emits Paged Files

      • getFilesByFolder

        @GET(value="v2/library/folders/{folderId}/files?next={next}")
retrofit2.Call<Paged<com.constantcontact.v2.library.File>> getFilesByFolder(@Path(value="folderId")
                                                                                                                                          java.lang.String folderId,
                                                                                                                                          @Path(value="next")
                                                                                                                                          java.lang.String nextLink)
        Get a Paged collection of File from a specific Folder.
        Parameters:
        folderId - The Folder ID
        nextLink - Value of the link found in the meta of the original call
        Returns:
        an Observable that emits Paged Files

      • updateFile

        @PUT(value="v2/library/files/{fileId}?include_payload=TRUE")

                                                                                                                            java.lang.String fileId,
                                                                                                                            @Body
                                                                                                                            com.constantcontact.v2.library.File file)

        an Observable that emits an updated File

      • moveFiles

        @PUT(value="v2/library/folders/{folderId}/files")
retrofit2.Call<com.constantcontact.v2.library.File> moveFiles(@Path(value="folderId")
                                                                                                                java.lang.String folderId,
                                                                                                                @Body
                                                                                                                java.lang.String[] fileIds)
        Move multiple File to a different Folder
        Parameters:
        folderId - The Folder ID
        fileIds - Array of File ID's that will be moved to the new folder
        Returns:
        an Observable that emits an Array of updated Files

      • deleteFile

        @DELETE(value="v2/library/files/{fileId}")
retrofit2.Call<retrofit2.Response> deleteFile(@Path(value="fileId")
                                                                                         java.lang.String fileId)
        Delete a File
        Parameters:
        fileId - The File ID
        Returns:
        an Observable that emits a Response

      • deleteFilesInTrash

        @DELETE(value="v2/library/folders/trash/files")
retrofit2.Call<retrofit2.Response> deleteFilesInTrash()
        Delete all File in the Trash Folder
        Returns:
        an Observable that emits a Response

      • getFileUploadStatus

        @GET(value="v2/library/files/uploadstatus/{fileId}")
retrofit2.Call<com.constantcontact.v2.library.FileUploadStatus[]> getFileUploadStatus(@Path(value="fileId")
                                                                                                                                           java.lang.String fileIds)
        Get the FileUploadStatus of one or more File
        Parameters:
        fileIds - Send one File ID, or multiples merged into one string separated by commas (no spaces)
        Returns:
        an Observable that emits an array of FileUploadStatuses

      • uploadFile

        @Multipart
 @Headers(value="Content-Type: multipart/form-data")
 @POST(value="v2/library/files")
retrofit2.Call<retrofit2.Response> uploadFile(@Part(value="data")
                                                                                                                                               okhttp3.RequestBody file,
                                                                                                                                               @Part(value="description")
                                                                                                                                               java.lang.String description,
                                                                                                                                               @Part(value="file_name")
                                                                                                                                               java.lang.String fileName,
                                                                                                                                               @Part(value="file_type")
                                                                                                                                               java.lang.String fileType,
                                                                                                                                               @Part(value="folder_id")
                                                                                                                                               java.lang.String folderId,
                                                                                                                                               @Part(value="source")
                                                                                                                                               java.lang.String source)
        Upload a new File to the Library
        Parameters:
        file - File
        description - A description of the file
        fileName - The name of the file
        fileType - FileType
        folderId - The ID of the Folder you wish to upload to
        source - FileSource
        Returns:
        an Observable that emits a Response - the File's new ID can be obtained from the headers of the Response
